name: Dennis in the closet
description:
Dennis in the closet is a physic based game where you fumble around in your room and figures out different ways on how your life could have ended and re-enact it! (Don't worry, you are a skeleton so you are pretty much dead already)

Made by Julia from Juice Machine and Isac from Mana Brigade for a Game Jam arrange by Gameport, a local game incubator in Sweden.

How to play:

  • Use A, S, D, F to select different body part to control
  • Use right / left mousebutton to grab and release items
  • Use the mouse to drag Dennis around in the room using brute force.
    • OBS! Sadly the exit button doesn't work so tab out and close application that way instead

We also won the jam! Hurray!

Check out more of our friends from Mana brigade!
